Index.Fully backwards compatible with existing: Fully backwards compatible with existing scripts and clients
Index.Got an old AMX lying about? Load it up: Got an old AMX lying about?  Load it up on the open.mp server straight out of the box and join your friends playing on the SA:MP client.  Then when you want to enhance your code try our...
Index.We've stuck with pawn, but with a new co: We've stuck with pawn, but with a new compiler engineered to make your code more robust, and more functions to manipulate the server and client.  If that's still not enough there's an...
Index.Get access to all the server features av: Get access to all the server features available in pawn, plus the universe of C++ libraries and frameworks.  Once you've mastered this why not help improve the server via our...
Index.The server is fully open source, and we: The server is fully open source, and we welcome all contributions big or small.  Help write the next version, or just post about any problems you find; despite our attempts to have...
Index.Many SA:MP bugs, well known and obscure,: Many SA:MP bugs, well known and obscure, have been fixed.  No more hacky work-arounds; no more community bug-fix projects; you have all the proper tools in your hands now.
Index.A multiplayer mod for Grand Theft Auto:: A multiplayer mod for Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas that is fully backwards compatible with San Andreas Multiplayer.

Footer.A multiplayer mod for Grand Theft Auto:: A multiplayer mod for Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas that is fully backwards compatible with San Andreas Multiplayer.

Announcements.The open.mp launcher is out now and open: The open.mp launcher is out now and open source!
Announcements.open.mp released its own launcher to bro: open.mp released its own launcher to browse servers using a reliable internet list and join your favorite servers!

Servers.servers-stats: {totalPlayers} players on {serverCount} servers with an average of {averagePlayers} players per server.
Servers.server-sumbitted: {serverCodeHn} is added to our pending list. If it's not available after maximum 48 hours, you can contact us on Discord!
Servers.The specified IP did not resolve to a SA: The specified IP did not resolve to a SA-MP server.

Partners.Servers helping us in beta testing by ru: Servers helping us in beta testing by running open.mp and reporting bugs and issues are listed here. You can do the same by running your server using open.mp and help us with finding bugs and issues; Then tell us about your servers on our discord so we can list them here.
Partners.Those who are contributing to our commun: Those who are contributing to our community will have permanent perks in future when we are releasing for public use and when our server listing is ready.
Partners.Note: Partnership program is temporarily: Note: Partnership program is temporarily closed as we promised. Servers reserving a slot can still join, but we do not take any new requests for now, if you are still interested, you can ask your questions on our discord, but if it's about new ways of getting into the list, we do not have plans yet.
